title: kaNNan madura idhazhai
sahitya:
kaNNan madhura idazhai aDaindAi




anupallavi



puNNiyam IdO yOgiyar viNNOr inbura maraLI nI iNaiyillA
 nAdamOD-ishai amudu pozhindAi pankaja tirumalarp-pAdam shEndAi



caraNam 1

 
unnuDan konji kaNamOr yugamAi uLLam urugum ennai marandAi
 taruNam pArttu un nenjam irangi nIyAghilum enadu peyar shol


caraNam 2

un tiru nAmam kadari pulambum aDiyAL rAdhai enum aghadip-pEdai
 viraha vEdanaip-puyal maDindAL enrOr mozhi pughazh vEin-kuzhalE
